import turtle   # 导入turtle库

pen = turtle.Pen()    # 创建画笔
pen.pensize(5)    # 设置画笔粗细
pen.speed(0)    # 设置画笔速度

s = 10    # 初始画线长度

# 绘制
for i in range(100):    # 修改循环次数
    pen.forward(s)
    pen.right(90)
    # 变量增加
    s = s + 10

pen.hideturtle()    # 隐藏画笔

turtle.done()

import turtle

pen = turtle.Pen()    # 创建画笔
pen.pensize(5)    # 设置画笔粗细
pen.speed(0)    # 设置画笔速度

s = 10    # 初始画线长度

color = input("颜色：")    # 输入颜色
pen.pencolor(color)    # 设置画笔颜色

# 绘制
for i in range(100):
    pen.forward(s)
    pen.right(75)
    s = s + 10

pen.hideturtle()    # 隐藏画笔

turtle.done()

import turtle

pen = turtle.Pen()    # 创建画笔
pen.pensize(5)    # 设置画笔粗细
pen.speed(0)    # 设置画笔速度

s = 10    # 初始画线长度

color = input("颜色：")    # 输入颜色
pen.pencolor(color)    # 设置画笔颜色

angle = int(input("角度："))    # 设置角度

# 绘制
for i in range(100):
    pen.forward(s)
    pen.right(angle)    # 修改角度
    s = s + 10

pen.hideturtle()    # 隐藏画笔

turtle.done()
